channel.title: Comments on: GLIDER Folding Electric Scooter

item.title: By: montanadad
item.dc:creator: montanadad
item.description: i love this electric scooter more than my son does now when he asks for a ride to his friends house i tell him to take his scooter. i get to stay home instead of driving him around.
item.content:encoded: i love this electric scooter more than my son does now when he asks for a ride to his friends house i tell him to take his scooter. i get to stay home instead of driving him around.

item.title: By: TRAX
item.dc:creator: TRAX
item.description: Thanks, Jonathan! Definitely better than LA traffic, huh!
item.content:encoded: Thanks, Jonathan! Definitely better than LA traffic, huh!

item.title: By: jonathan meiners
item.dc:creator: jonathan meiners
item.description: I've had my Glider Scooter over a month now and use it in Los Angeles between my apartment and the subway and the office. I LOVE THIS THING!
item.content:encoded: I’ve had my Glider Scooter over a month now and use it in Los Angeles between my apartment and the subway and the office. I LOVE THIS THING!

item.title: By: Sam Gilbert
item.dc:creator: Sam Gilbert
item.description: My red glider saved daily commute! I use this to get to the subway and to work and its working perfect.
item.content:encoded: My red glider saved daily commute! I use this to get to the subway and to work and its working perfect.

item.title: By: TRAX
item.dc:creator: TRAX
item.description: Thanks, Martin! Here's to a great commute!
item.content:encoded: Thanks, Martin! Here’s to a great commute!

item.title: By: Martin
item.dc:creator: Martin
item.description: I got the Glider because I don't like walking to work. Its perfect. It's really quick and easy to store by my desk.
item.content:encoded: I got the Glider because I don’t like walking to work. Its perfect. It’s really quick and easy to store by my desk.

item.title: By: lbeagley79
item.dc:creator: lbeagley79
item.description: Only had this scooter for a couple of days, but what a blast! Sturdy construction, great battery life, and definitely faster than I expected. Well done GOTRAX!
item.content:encoded: Only had this scooter for a couple of days, but what a blast! Sturdy construction, great battery life, and definitely faster than I expected. Well done GOTRAX!

item.title: By: TRAX
item.dc:creator: TRAX
item.description: Glad to hear you like it Clarerita! Stay Stellar!
item.content:encoded: Glad to hear you like it Clarerita! Stay Stellar!

item.title: By: clarerita
item.dc:creator: clarerita
item.description: Well designed, sturdy, folds easily, charges easily, smooth ride. Thank you so much for an awesome product!
item.content:encoded: Well designed, sturdy, folds easily, charges easily, smooth ride. Thank you so much for an awesome product!

item.title: By: LS
item.dc:creator: LS
item.description: I love riding this scooter and I had a reallyy nice experience with buying and the shipping.
item.content:encoded: I love riding this scooter and I had a reallyy nice experience with buying and the shipping.
